title: what do u want the  Champion rotation to be
body: i want it to be shyvana{{champion:102}} ,heimerdinger{{champion:74}} , zed{{champion:238}} , kindred{{champion:203}} ,fiddle{{champion:9}} , ekko{{champion:245}}   and  gangplank{{champion:41}}

replies.body:
Could we have a 10 yordles rotation in April fools week?:D 

Ps. Be sure to include Teemo;)
I actually wanna play Kindred so I would be happy with that rotation.(even though I own the other champs)
